briefdescription.para: Use the default (rectangular) layout.
Use a narrower, vertically stacked layout.
Widget layout.
Constructor for QgsCompoundColorWidget.
Returns the current color for the dialog.
Sets whether opacity modification (transparency) is permitted for the color dialog.

detaileddescription.para:
Defaults to true.
allowOpacity
set to false to disable opacity modification
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the widget's color has been "discarded" and the selected color should not be stored in the recent color list.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to avoid adding color to recent color list on widget destruction.

briefdescription.para: Triggers a user prompt for creating a new user color scheme.

detaileddescription.para: The parent argument must be set to a valid parent widget for the dialog prompts.

briefdescription.para: Triggers a user prompt for importing a new color scheme from an existing GPL file.

detaileddescription.para: The parent argument must be set to a valid parent widget for the dialog prompts.

briefdescription.para: Triggers a user prompt for removing an existing user color scheme.

detaileddescription.para: The parent argument must be set to a valid parent widget for the dialog prompts.

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the dialog's color changes.
Sets the current color for the dialog.
Sets the color to show in an optional "previous color" section.
Returns the path to the user's palette folder.
Returns the average color from the pixels in an image.
Repopulates the scheme combo box with current color schemes.
Samples a color from the desktop.
Saves all widget settings.
Ends a color picking operation.

parameterdescription.para: global position of pixel to sample color from
set to true to actually sample the color, false to just cancel the color picking operation

briefdescription.para: Updates the state of actions for the current selected scheme.
A custom QGIS widget for selecting a color, including options for selecting colors via hue wheel, color swatches, and a color sampler.
